name: Holiday Inn Express Sheboygan - Kohler (I-43)

reviews.text: I stayed at the Holiday Inn Express in Sheboygan on 9/3/12. The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. It is in a good location for the business I had to do in the area. I will stay there again when I have to be in the area.
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this Holiday Inn to everyone. The staff was very friendly and the rooms were spotless. We needed 7 rooms for two weeks and couldn't ask for anything better. Thanks from Sgt. Ivory, A.
reviews.title: Absolutely the best Holiday Inn we have ever stayed in!!!!!

reviews.text: Checked in to the Holiday Inn Express for an art show. Very nice, ok location but 10 minute drive away from the actual "downtown" of Sheboygan. Rooms were clean, nicely decorated, no musty smells, only 3 towels for 2 people, again. Air conditioner was decent, quiet, did not run the entire time which is nice. Mattress was very comfortable, but the 4 pillows on the bed have seen better days & need to be replaced in the worst way. Staff was very nice, we appreciated that one of the girls had a giant notebook filled with mapquests to local attractions, including a specific restaurant we wanted to go to, along with positive recommendations. We really did not appreciate that we had to pay a rate of $132.99 for Friday nite, but $155.99 for Saturday nite. As if Sheboygan is a big hot spot...we are coming back next year for the same show, but will not be staying here at those rates. Breakfast choices are the usual, but how can anyone eat that sausage gravy?
reviews.title: Very nice, but...

reviews.text: What a delight to check into a motel and find such a welcoming facility. I can not find a thing that would need improvement. I would recommend this motel to everyone. When visiting Sheboygan we will make it a point to stay at this awesome facility.
reviews.title: Super super clean facility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here in Sheboyan for a family reunion that was in Elkhart Lake and this was the closest hotel we could find due to race week, which was a pleasant suprise and was right of the highway. Great experience, great customer service, nice room, nice complimentary breakfast, close to Lake Michigan. We fell in love with Sheboygan. Only thing I would change is the staffs uniforms I thought I was in a Dr. Office. Lots of shopping in walking distance. Amanada at the front desk went above and beyond the call of duty to resolve a medical issue which was outstanding. Would love to see the hotel become pet friendly as we had to leave some family members at home.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.text: Stayed here for a couple of nights on business. Check in was quick and easy. Hotel was very clean and staff was friendly. Bed comfortable. So, it was everything I needed for a couple of nights. I would and have stayed here again.
reviews.title: Business trip

reviews.text: helpful and friendly staff. Very clean rooms with newer furnishings. Breakfast was the typical HI Ex stuff. It has easy fwy access and is very quiet. If you have to go to this area then you would do well to stay here.
reviews.title: clean and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed one Saturday night. The Staff was very frendly & helpful at check-in.
reviews.title: Clean-Clean-Clean

reviews.text: Our room was the cleanest we have evere stayed in. We can not stress this enough!! The room was nicely appointed,and the bed was comfortable. We slept soundly as the room was Quiet. We did not try the breakfast, as we had brunch plans elsewhere.Super job housekeeping dept !!! We will b e back !!
reviews.title: Business trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was in town for one night for a business trip. This is a relatively new hotel and in very good shape. Some shopping and restaurants close by and the staff was very helpful in finding a place for dinner. Rooms were standard and very comfortable includes a fridge and microwave and flat screen tv. I would stay again
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel and Location
Good Holiday Inn Express
reviews.text: Only spent one night here and was really just in and out to sleep, but overall had a good experience. The front desk was nice and helpful. The room was clean and nice. I am increasingly becoming a fan of the Holiday Inn Express, they just seem to be well run.

reviews.title: Newer Holiday Inn Express with above average continental breakfast
reviews.text: The breakfast was fine. Nothing amazing but all the usual stuff. They did have a pancake maker that I have never seen before. You press a button and it hums for a bit and then spits out a fresh pancake at the end of a conveyor built. Easier and less messy then the waffle make that some other places have.

reviews.title: Hidden gem
reviews.text: Stayed one night at the Sheboygan Holiday Inn Express for work. Arrived late to find the front desk staff friendly and welcoming. The grounds, hotel and room were clean and well kept.

reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
reviews.text: The pleasant surprise was the free continental breakfast was surprisingly good with a wide selection of items, coffees, juices, make your own pancake machine, eggs, sausages, and quite a few other items.

reviews.title: Nice stop for an overnight.
reviews.text: I did not have time to use the pool or exercise room but looked at both and they were clean and in excellent condition.

reviews.title: Great Location, Nice Stay!
reviews.text: The property is very convenient to the expressway and shopping, you can actually walk to Walmart. There was plenty of parking in the lot. Check-in was quick and the clerk was friendly. The hotel is clean and modern. My room had a fridge, microwave and flat screen TV, everything seemed to operate properly. No noise issues being close to the expressway. The bathroom was properly stocked with amenities and was clean.

reviews.title: Nice property.
reviews.text: The breakfast area was well stocked and cared for, it was kept clean. Everything seemed quick and easy, the way it should be when traveling. I would definitely stay here again when in the area.

reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, Better than Expected
reviews.text: Have never stayed at a Holiday Inn Express so I wasn't sure what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised from the minute I walked up to the registration desk. The staff was extremely courteous and helpful. As we were going through the check in process, I was asked if I was a Priority Club member. I am but haven't used it in probably 5 years. They were still able to find my membership and was awarded all the little amenities that one is afforded when one is a member.

reviews.title: Great hotel and very convenient location off highway
reviews.text: The Pro's.

reviews.title: Pretty nice
reviews.text: A selection of different pillows. Hard, medium or soft.

aka: Holiday Inn Express Sheboygan - Kohler (i-43) Hotel
description: The Holiday Inn Express Sheboygan/Kohler is conveniently located off Interstate 43; an hour drive from Milwaukee or Green Bay. We are only minutes away from Wisconsin s most popular golf courses such as The Bull, Blackwolf Run, and Whistling Straits. Visit notorious museums in the area, such as the Kohler Design Center, or the John Michael Kohler Arts Center. Take the family fishing on Lake Michigan or just relax on Sheboygan s Shores. With easy Interstate access, you can also check out the Road America race track in Elkhart Lake, attend a play at the Stefanie H. Weill Center for the Performing Arts, or even climb high on the rock wall at The Fieldhouse. The Kohler Company, Acuity Insurance, JL French and Gardner Denver Thomas are some of our local businesses that are only minutes away. Utilize our 24-hour business center and relax after work at our manager s reception Monday-Thursday. Swim in our heated indoor pool or work out in our 24-hour fitness center. Need to get away from the stress of work? Relax in a spacious suite which includes FREE HSIA, FREE local calls, and expanded cable channels. Complete your stay at the Holiday Inn Express Sheboygan/Kohler and dine in one of the Sheboygan s exquisite restaurants like Margaux or Trattoria Stefano. Start your morning off SMART with our Deluxe Complimentary Continental Breakfast bar featuring our hot breakfast and famous cinnamon rolls with Smart Roast coffee. Our dedicated staff is here to serve you. Book today!
